titleStmt.title: Actis made by dyuers our most noble progenytours knynges of this realme agaynst unlaufull games
Proclamations. 1536
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)

publicationStmt.publisher: Tho. Berthelet regius impressor excudeba .. Cum Privilegio,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and publication date from STC.
Apparently sent out with "A proclamation concernynge apparayle, mayntenaunce of archerye, punysshemente of beggers, and vnlaufull games" (STC 7788)--STC.
Identified as STC 7788 on UMI microfilm reel 7.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
